name: Wild West Sniper: Cowboy War
description:
Welcome to the world of Wild West Sniper, an FPS game equipped with great graphics and realistic sound effects!

Wild West Sniper game offers you to be the hero of the west world, where you can shoot in the world of westland, save the town from militants. As the town's sheriff, you must protect the town from enemies, and complete missions that get harder as you level up.

In this game, you will experience various conflict areas and scenarios, such as the capture of a military base by militants, and the liberation of the base from militants. Can you hit all the targets as a first person shooter, fps of shooting games?

Wild West Sniper is a kind of battlefield game where you can destroy enemy targets with a bunch of sniper 3D assassin guns and rifles. Are you ready for this action to become the master of shooter games and the westland world?

Sometimes it will be enough to just hit the target they are standing in front of, not the enemy soldiers. Helicopters, vehicles, gas tankers, ammunition depots will be targets in the game and these targets will be marked with red. You have to hit the targets and play the legend of the shooter games to continue to the next level and rank up!

Feature of the game:

- Addictive gameplay
- Challenging scenarios
- Lots of different sniper guns
- Training that develops aiming skills!
- Aim the target and take your best shot!
- Unique quality graphics and realistic sound effects!

As you level up, you will rank up and you will be able to get different weapons. So remember to play the game regularly and strive to pass the challenging levels. In this action and adventure sniper game you will crawl on the ground, run, find the target, hold your breath and release the trigger. Congratulations, you took your best shot and saved the town!

Start playing this action-packed war game to become a western sniper and hero now and explore the challenging world of Wild West Sniper.

Enjoy Wild West Sniper committed to the action!
